page.title: 04VILLAGE LIFE-OLD KILPATRICK
page.content:
The people of Old Kilpatrick were asked to give their opinions on certain aspects of village life.
Most villagers agreed that it was a{lovely, peaceful, friendly place to live, but feel that the {picturesque}look of the village is spoiled by the massive support pillars of the Erskine Bridge.
In recent years the village has {expanded}with more council houses being built and the proposed construction in 1986 of 700 private houses, will enlarge it even further.
The residents are{afraid}that through this rapid expansion Old Kilpatrick may lose its{close knit community {atmosphere. .
